metadata.title: CVE-2015-6938 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file browser in notebook/notebookapp.py in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and Jupyter Notebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a folder name.  NOTE: this was originally reported as a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, but this may be inaccurate.

criterions.comment: ipython package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
